data.text: @SenatorHick Crossing the border illegally is just wrong! Fund ICE!

@CaraNicAine @SenatorHick Tell me please which law would have stopped mass shootings and not been an infringement or gone against standing precedent from the Supreme Court. You seem knowledgeable on the subject so would like your take on the issue instead of a sweeping statement.

@SenatorHick Sounds pretty good to me, the only reason they are masked is because you would be the first to Dox them if you could. ICE is doing exactly what we voted for. Removing illigal aliens that the last administration welcomed in so you could pad your voting numbers.
@SenatorHick Whose interests are you serving by subverting common sense immigration laws?
@IlluminationsJL @SenatorHick It must be painful to be so undereducated.
@joycesurprenant @SenatorHick No complaints when Obama was deporting illegals. It is suddenly immoral when a Republican, specifically Trump. https://t.co/VBpfj7kG8c

@SenatorHick ICE has the right to protect their family's from doxxing. If you're illegal then self deport and come back in the legal way. You didn't say a word when the border czar Harris opened the flood gates, so you should sit this one out.
@SenatorHick Yes. By all means. Lawbreakers must never fear law enforcement. We should just have tea and sing kumbaya.
